channel.title: HEV Startup Scripting Error
channel.description:
A Steam member named DahMainahGaimah found a bug in the scripting of the HEV startup. Apparently, one of the lines in the startup ("Automatic medical systems engaged.") is said twice. Here's my video showing it: [youtu.be/Y32cVHtyEZ8](https://youtu.be/Y32cVHtyEZ8)
He has made a fix for it: [url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=443405545[/url]

item.title: HEV Startup Scripting Error
item.dc:creator: Mr_GameCrazy
item.description:
A Steam member named DahMainahGaimah found a bug in the scripting of the HEV startup. Apparently, one of the lines in the startup (“Automatic medical systems engaged.”) is said twice. Here’s my video showing it: youtu.be/Y32cVHtyEZ8

He has made a fix for it: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=443405545
